sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
	A.order_id
	,A.item_id
	,A.product_id
	,A.quantity
	,A.list_price
	,A.discount
FROM 
	sales.order_items AS A 
	INNER JOIN sales.orders AS B 
		ON A.order_id = B.order_id
WHERE 
	B.order_date >= CAST('@{item().FechaProceso}' AS DATETIME) 
	AND B.order_date < DATEADD(DAY, 1, CAST('@{item().FechaProceso}' AS DATETIME))

SELECT 
	order_id
	,customer_id
	,order_status
	,order_date
	,required_date
	,shipped_date
	,store_id
	,staff_id
FROM 
	sales.orders
WHERE 
	order_date >= CAST('@{item().FechaProceso}' AS DATETIME) 
	AND order_date < DATEADD(DAY, 1, CAST('@{item().FechaProceso}' AS DATETIME))

properties.description: Trigger que se ejecuta diariamente para cambiar los valores de la tabla parametros
